sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Slider from "./Slider"; import { useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import './components/Apartament.css' import room from "./room"; import './RoomDescription.css' function RoomDescription(){ const {id}=useParams(); const rooms=room.find((element)=>{ return element.id===id }); return(

Properties:

Accommodates: {rooms.accommodates}

Beds: {rooms.bed}

Size: {rooms.size}

More Info:

{rooms.paragraph}

Amenities:

WiFi
A/C
TV
Towels
{rooms.glass} {rooms.icon}
Telephone
Kitchen
{rooms.glasstitle}
{rooms.icontitle}
) } export default RoomDescription
